articles.content:
Severe allergies should be added to the list of possible side effects of AstraZeneca's Covid-19 vaccination, the EU's drug regulator said.
The development comes after 41 reports of possible anaphyla… [+3863 chars]
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency said on Friday it had 'recommended an update to the product information to include anaphylaxis and hypersensitivity (allergic reactions) as side effects.'
articles.title: EU's drug regulator says severe allergies should be added to list of side effects - Daily Mail
